html: I spent #TaxDay at a day care facility in #Orlando to highlight the rising costs of child care in our country. My bipartisan bill—the PACE Act—would make an existing tax credit refundable so more central Florida working families can better afford child care.pic.twitter.com/ahUyNGN7rJ

html: I voted today to send a strong message that the U.S. condemns human rights abuses by Saudi Arabia, particularly in the war in Yemen. html: My community in #Orlando was devastated after the #Pulse shooting. It’s one of the many reasons I decided to seek public office. So I’m grateful there are voices like yours out there. Keep being visible & giving us hope that our future can be better, brighter & fiercer! #QEinDC
text: My community in #Orlando was devastated after the #Pulse shooting. It’s one of the many reasons I decided to seek public office. So I’m grateful there are voices like yours out there. Keep being visible & giving us hope that our future can be better, brighter & fiercer! #QEinDC

html: Here are a few of my favorite quotes from the night: @tanfrance: I don’t want to be the reason I’m unhappy. @jvn: The only thing you come into this world with and leave the world with is your relationship with yourself. #QEinDCpic.twitter.com/VvMJHJmoKT

html: On this #CleanWaterDay, I am pushing Congress to force federal agencies to study the potential impacts of algae blooms on public health & our economy. We can no longer ignore the devastating effects this could have on our fisheries & the tourism industry that Florida relies on.
text: On this #CleanWaterDay, I am pushing Congress to force federal agencies to study the potential impacts of algae blooms on public health & our economy. We can no longer ignore the devastating effects this could have on our fisheries & the tourism industry that Florida relies on.

html: While Fla. struggles with harmful algae blooms that threaten our environment & economic stability, this administration continues to pursue a #DirtyWaterRule that would revoke protections that keep drinking water sources safe. #ProtectCleanWaterpic.twitter.com/MPgEsAabY7
text: While Fla. struggles with harmful algae blooms that threaten our environment & economic stability, this administration continues to pursue a #DirtyWaterRule that would revoke protections that keep drinking water sources safe. #ProtectCleanWaterpic.twitter.com/MPgEsAabY7

html: Few experiences are more difficult for working families than when someone loses a job. html: I just voted to close the wage gap & put more money in the pockets of hardworking families. The #PaycheckFairness Act will create jobs & increase economic prosperity in our communities. Not to mention—it’s 2019! It’s way past time women received #EqualPayForEqualWork.
text: I just voted to close the wage gap & put more money in the pockets of hardworking families. The #PaycheckFairness Act will create jobs & increase economic prosperity in our communities. Not to mention—it’s 2019! It’s way past time women received #EqualPayForEqualWork.

html: I came to Congress to vote in support of legislation like the #EqualityAct. Because despite our nation’s progress, too many #LGBTQ Americans still live in fear and face discrimination and bigotry.
text: I came to Congress to vote in support of legislation like the #EqualityAct. Because despite our nation’s progress, too many #LGBTQ Americans still live in fear and face discrimination and bigotry.

html: On June 2016 (Pride Month), a gunman walked into an Orlando nightclub & senselessly murdered 49 people—most of them members of the #LGBTQ community. I saw hate rear its ugly head right in my backyard & knew we needed more champions for this community.
text: On June 2016 (Pride Month), a gunman walked into an Orlando nightclub & senselessly murdered 49 people—most of them members of the #LGBTQ community. I saw hate rear its ugly head right in my backyard & knew we needed more champions for this community.

html: The compromise deal offered by bipartisan negotiators balances the urgent need to avert another government shutdown with reasonable steps to secure our border. I voted for it because I know this is a good compromise & one that should serve as an example for future negotiations.

html: Since Members of Congress seem to be the only ones who get paid during a shutdown, then they should at least be required to work during a shutdown. MORE:https://murphy.house.gov/news/documentsingle.aspx?DocumentID=973 …
text:
Since Members of Congress seem to be the only ones who get paid during a shutdown, then they should at least be required to work during a shutdown.
 
MORE:https://murphy.house.gov/news/documentsingle.aspx?DocumentID=973 …

html: If the government ever shuts down again, my bill—the Keep Congress Working Act—would not allow Congress to recess or adjourn for more than 12 hrs.
text: If the government ever shuts down again, my bill—the Keep Congress Working Act—would not allow Congress to recess or adjourn for more than 12 hrs.

html: More than 800,000 federal workers suffered as they struggled to make ends meet—16,000 of these living in my home state of Florida. And we’ve lost public confidence in our ability to get stuff done…not to mention it was incredibly embarrassing on the world stage.
text:
More than 800,000 federal workers suffered as they struggled to make ends meet—16,000 of these living in my home state of Florida.
 
And we’ve lost public confidence in our ability to get stuff done…not to mention it was incredibly embarrassing on the world stage.

html: I think we can all agree that there were no winners of the last government shutdown, only losers. American taxpayers lost billions of dollars in economic growth, money that should have been spent on improving our schools, fixing our roads, and paying down our debt.
text:
I think we can all agree that there were no winners of the last government shutdown, only losers.
 
American taxpayers lost billions of dollars in economic growth, money that should have been spent on improving our schools, fixing our roads, and paying down our debt.

html: Last week, I voted to reopen the government so that we don't hold federal employees and national priorities hostage while negotiations continue. This week, I will support more funding bills to do the same. It's time to put partisanship aside, and reopen the govt. #FL07 #FlaPol

html: President Trump's plan to immediately withdraw our forces from Syria is a terrible strategic error. It'll undermine our national security, abandon our allies, and embolden our enemies. The fact Putin & Assad applaud this action is the best evidence it is flawed and foolish. 1/2

html: I'm honored to be the first Vietnamese-American woman to serve in Congress. As an American, I'm deeply concerned by @POTUS' attempts to renegotiate the 2008 MOU between Vietnam & the U.S., which would potentially deport Vietnamese refugees who arrived in the U.S. before 1995. 2/3
text: I'm honored to be the first Vietnamese-American woman to serve in Congress. As an American, I'm deeply concerned by @POTUS' attempts to renegotiate the 2008 MOU between Vietnam & the U.S., which would potentially deport Vietnamese refugees who arrived in the U.S. before 1995. 2/3

html: My family fled Communist Vietnam when I was a baby because they would have rather died in search of light than to have lived in darkness. Thanks to a program under President Carter, we resettled to the U.S., and I became a proud citizen of this great nation. 1/3
text: My family fled Communist Vietnam when I was a baby because they would have rather died in search of light than to have lived in darkness. Thanks to a program under President Carter, we resettled to the U.S., and I became a proud citizen of this great nation. 1/3

html: George H.W. Bush was the epitome of a statesman—WW2 pilot, ambassador, CIA director, VP, and the 41st President. He was beloved by his family, exuded grace and integrity, and will be deeply missed by the nation he served so well. RIP, Mr. President.pic.twitter.com/a16Xi35bSD

html: Congrats to my friend @RepDerekKilmer on his election as @HouseNewDems Chair! Congrats to our new Vice-Chairs as well: @RepTerriSewell, @RepScottPeters, @RepAnnieKuster & @RepDelBene. Such a solid slate of strong leaders to help pass pro-economic growth & pro-innovation policies!

html: As the 1st woman Speaker, @NancyPelosi has proven herself a force to be reckoned with & willing to listen to the diverse voices that make our Caucus great. She's earned my vote for Speaker. No matter who has the gavel or who's in the White House, I will always put #FL07 first. 2/

html: I congratulate the incoming leadership of @HouseBlueDogs, including my friends Co-Chair for Administration @RepStephMurphy, Co-Chair for Policy @RepOHalleran, & Co-Chair for Communications @RepLouCorrea. I look forward to working with them to strengthen America’s middle class.

html: Humbled my colleagues on @HouseBlueDogs unanimously elected me to lead our 24-member coalition. I’m excited to co-chair this group of principled, pragmatic Democrats as we work in a bipartisan way to put our fiscal house in order and keep our nation safe.pic.twitter.com/n8BL2zBCvj

html: In 2014, Congress enacted a law authorizing a federally-sponsored vote in #PuertoRico on its status. I hope PR holds a simple yes-or-no vote on whether it wants to be a state, and I hope voters reaffirm they support statehood. U.S. citizens in PR deserve true equality. #FL07
text: In 2014, Congress enacted a law authorizing a federally-sponsored vote in #PuertoRico on its status. I hope PR holds a simple yes-or-no vote on whether it wants to be a state, and I hope voters reaffirm they support statehood. U.S. citizens in PR deserve true equality. #FL07

html: In a new divided Congress, we have two paths: partisan gridlock or bipartisan consensus. The #ProblemSolvers Caucus last year proposed the #BreakTheGridlock rules reform package & will continue to push for changes. It’s not about a particular person; it’s about fixing a process.
text: In a new divided Congress, we have two paths: partisan gridlock or bipartisan consensus. The #ProblemSolvers Caucus last year proposed the #BreakTheGridlock rules reform package & will continue to push for changes. It’s not about a particular person; it’s about fixing a process.

html: On this #ThanksgivingDay, I'm so very grateful for my wonderful family and for the opportunity to serve you in Congress. I'm especially thankful to our men and women in uniform, our veterans, and our military families for their sacrifice in service to this great nation. #FL07

html: ...I’m optimistic about the future. But it won’t be easy. I’ll keep working in Congress to build bipartisan support to treat gun violence like the epidemic it is. We must work together, and we must act like our lives - and our children’s lives - depend on it. Because they do.
text: ...I’m optimistic about the future. But it won’t be easy. I’ll keep working in Congress to build bipartisan support to treat gun violence like the epidemic it is. We must work together, and we must act like our lives - and our children’s lives - depend on it. Because they do.

html: ...I refuse to accept these mass shootings - and the daily drumbeat of gun violence in our communities - as the new normal. From Pulse to Parkland to Las Vegas, I’m continually inspired by the survivors and victims of these tragedies, their stories, and their advocacy...
text: ...I refuse to accept these mass shootings - and the daily drumbeat of gun violence in our communities - as the new normal. From Pulse to Parkland to Las Vegas, I’m continually inspired by the survivors and victims of these tragedies, their stories, and their advocacy...

html: ...We don’t have all the answers, but we do have some, and some is a start. What this Congress lacks, however, is the courage to stand up to the corporate gun lobby and pass even incremental, popular reforms. It’s shameful. We deserve better. Our children deserve better...
text: ...We don’t have all the answers, but we do have some, and some is a start. What this Congress lacks, however, is the courage to stand up to the corporate gun lobby and pass even incremental, popular reforms. It’s shameful. We deserve better. Our children deserve better...

html: ...We must do more than simply pay lip service to mental health; we need to strengthen it and better fund it. Weapons should be harder to get, not easier. Assault weapons that can take down hundreds in a manner of minutes belong on battlefields, not on our streets...
text: ...We must do more than simply pay lip service to mental health; we need to strengthen it and better fund it. Weapons should be harder to get, not easier. Assault weapons that can take down hundreds in a manner of minutes belong on battlefields, not on our streets...

html: ...After each of these tragedies, we looked for a single deficiency to “solve” this problem because it was easier than identifying the real problem: we have a systemic gun violence problem in this country. We need more than patchwork fixes; we need comprehensive reform...
text: ...After each of these tragedies, we looked for a single deficiency to “solve” this problem because it was easier than identifying the real problem: we have a systemic gun violence problem in this country. We need more than patchwork fixes; we need comprehensive reform...

html: US citizens in Puerto Rico have earned the right to full representation & full equality under the law, which they currently lack. Those who move here deserve equal opportunity with respect to jobs, health care, education & housing. Justice and equality will always be my goals.
text: US citizens in Puerto Rico have earned the right to full representation & full equality under the law, which they currently lack. Those who move here deserve equal opportunity with respect to jobs, health care, education & housing. Justice and equality will always be my goals.

html: I was deeply moved by today’s tribute to Senator John McCain. It was such a fitting way to honor the life and legacy of this lion of a man. He always put country first. He never lost faith in America or the American people. May his memory guide our way, and may he rest in peace.
text: I was deeply moved by today’s tribute to Senator John McCain. It was such a fitting way to honor the life and legacy of this lion of a man. He always put country first. He never lost faith in America or the American people. May his memory guide our way, and may he rest in peace.

html: I helped lead bipartisan effort to clarify CDC can sponsor research on #GunViolence; a major win in a 20-yr fight. Dismayed @HouseAppropsGOP rejected dedicated funding for that research. But fact is CDC doesn't need a dedicated fund; they just need to step up. Lives are at stake.

html: Today is the 150th anniversary of the #14thAmendment, which took the principle that “all men are created equal” and placed it in the Constitution—enshrining that principle in law. We must continue striving to banish discrimination and to realize this nation’s highest ideals.
text: Today is the 150th anniversary of the #14thAmendment, which took the principle that “all men are created equal” and placed it in the Constitution—enshrining that principle in law. We must continue striving to banish discrimination and to realize this nation’s highest ideals.

html: UPDATE: FEMA issued a statement that, in light of a federal court decision, it is notifying hotels that the Transitional Sheltering Assistance program is extended until July 5th to comply with the court’s order. If you are a TSA recipient, you cannot be evicted before that date.
text: UPDATE: FEMA issued a statement that, in light of a federal court decision, it is notifying hotels that the Transitional Sheltering Assistance program is extended until July 5th to comply with the court’s order. If you are a TSA recipient, you cannot be evicted before that date.

html: BREAKING NEWS —> Due to a federal judge’s decision, displaced families receiving help through FEMA’s Transitional Shelter Assistance hotel/motel program cannot be evicted this weekend. html: In 24 hours, Hamas fired 100+ rockets & mortar shells into Israel. A civilian home & a kindergarten were hit. This underscores why I intro'd a bill w/@RepBrianMast to help Israel defend itself. Proud the NDAA recently approved in the House includes language from our bill. #FlaPol

html: Iran can’t be allowed to obtain nuclear weapons. The Iran deal was not perfect but provided for intrusive inspections to keep Iran from cheating. POTUS's withdrawal ends inspections and makes it more likely Iran will obtain nukes. Congress must work to combat the Iranian threat.
text: Iran can’t be allowed to obtain nuclear weapons. The Iran deal was not perfect but provided for intrusive inspections to keep Iran from cheating. POTUS's withdrawal ends inspections and makes it more likely Iran will obtain nukes. Congress must work to combat the Iranian threat.

html: All displaced families will be allowed to stay in their transitional housing until at least May 14th. I will continue to push FEMA to extend that deadline until June 30th, so no displaced children lose housing while the Florida school year is ongoing.
text: All displaced families will be allowed to stay in their transitional housing until at least May 14th. I will continue to push FEMA to extend that deadline until June 30th, so no displaced children lose housing while the Florida school year is ongoing.

html: Pleased to report that, after a request from #PuertoRico Gov. @ricardorossello and a bipartisan effort by members of the FL congressional delegation, FEMA will no longer require 1,700 displaced PR families living in FL and other states to vacate their temporary motel/hotel rooms.
text: Pleased to report that, after a request from #PuertoRico Gov. @ricardorossello and a bipartisan effort by members of the FL congressional delegation, FEMA will no longer require 1,700 displaced PR families living in FL and other states to vacate their temporary motel/hotel rooms.

html: .@FEMA has agreed to unconditionally extend #TSA until May 14. @FEMA informs they will not be carrying out evictions today. @SenBillNelson @RepStephMurphy @marcorubio @RepDarrenSoto

html: A student was injured in a shooting at Forest High School in #Ocala today. It’s 19 years to the day since Columbine, and gun violence still plagues our schools. We must do more to protect our children. I pray for all affected and am grateful to our brave first responders.
text: A student was injured in a shooting at Forest High School in #Ocala today. It’s 19 years to the day since Columbine, and gun violence still plagues our schools. We must do more to protect our children. I pray for all affected and am grateful to our brave first responders.

html: My thoughts are with the families of Sgt. Noel Ramirez and Deputy Taylor Lindsey, who were senselessly murdered in the line of duty. Our law enforcement officers proudly wear the uniform despite the risks they face every day. I'm grateful for their service and sacrifice.
text: My thoughts are with the families of Sgt. Noel Ramirez and Deputy Taylor Lindsey, who were senselessly murdered in the line of duty. Our law enforcement officers proudly wear the uniform despite the risks they face every day. I'm grateful for their service and sacrifice.
